42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar said:When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was alive, we used to say: The most excellent member of the community of the Prophet (ﷺ) after himself is Abu Bakr, then ‘Umar, then 'Uthman

chapter.eng-name: Order Of The Companions In Respect Of Merit
